scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:app-shell" "npm run start:post-lists" "npm run start:header" "npm run start:signin" "npm run start:react-chat-app" "npm run start:manage-user"  "npm run start:report" "npm run start:notify"
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm run install:app-shell" "npm run install:post-lists" "npm run install:header" "npm run install:signin" "npm run install:react-chat-app" "npm run install:manage-user" "npm run install:report" "npm run install:notify"
